```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    first_obj = df.head()
    third_obj = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
      alt.X("Random Numbers:Q", bin=alt.Bin(maxbins=20)),
      alt.Y("count()")
    )
    return [first_obj, third_obj]

preview_data(data)
```
